attributes.action: That a by-election be triggered immediately if a serving MP changes party.
attributes.additional_details: When voting in a general election, one considers which party and which individual candidate would best serve the constituency and, probably, the country as a whole. I suspect that in a general election, the party counts for more than the individual. There has recently been a spate of MPs changing party mid-term and joining parties which their constituents *did not choose*.
attributes.background: Hold a by-election immediately if a serving MP changes party affliation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
